5A270F7C.Line1.804B7: Father always respected their beliefs and customs. It was important that I grew to understand his admiration.

8E100280.Line5.804B7: The two were close. Though...I think time has seen them drift apart.

F41B88FE.Line3.804B7: Whenever he talked about coming here to meet Airidah, I saw a light in his eyes that rivaled any fire.
